price: So We made it a deterrent punishment for those alive and for those who succeeded them, and an admonition for the righteous.
arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا نَكَٰلٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهَا وَمَا خَلۡفَهَا وَمَوۡعِظَةٗ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
